action_anime_movies.title: Akira
action_anime_movies.description: In a dystopian future, a biker gang member gains psychic powers that threaten the stability of the city, leading to a violent clash between the government, military, and the gangs.

action_anime_movies.title: Ghost in the Shell
action_anime_movies.description: Set in a futuristic world where cybernetic enhancements are common, a cyborg cop must hunt down a mysterious hacker known as the Puppet Master, raising questions about the nature of consciousness and humanity.

action_anime_movies.title: Naruto the Movie: Ninja Clash in the Land of Snow
action_anime_movies.description: Naruto and his friends are sent on a mission to protect an actress from a dangerous group trying to exploit her talents, leading to a series of action-packed confrontations.

action_anime_movies.title: Attack on Titan: The Roar of Awakening
action_anime_movies.description: Eren Yeager and his allies fight for survival against the Titans in an action-filled battle, as the true nature of the Titans begins to unravel and the stakes reach new heights.
